data.name: AddPhoto
data.comment: Action text for a button with 'add photo' on it

data.name: AdvancedCheckIn
data.comment: Action text for going to the detailed check-in page.

data.name: AppTileManager_Error_TileCreationGeneric
data.value: Unfortunately the tile could not be created at this time.

data.name: AppTileManager_NoNetwork
data.value: The network connection was not available to download the image needed to create the tile. Please try again later.

data.name: Data_Error_CannotReadCategories
data.value: There was a problem trying to read the categories list.

data.name: Facebook
data.comment: The name of Facebook

data.name: Friends
data.comment: Capitalized version of 'Friends' - for sharing with them

data.name: HereNow
data.comment: Action text for linking to the people who are at this place right now

data.name: HowToEstablishMayorship
data.value: If you would like to establish a mayorship, consider frequenting this place.
data.comment: Text describing how to get a mayorship by frequenting or checking in often to the place.

data.comment: Non-plural version when there is only one place in the list.

data.comment: Text to show while an 'exploring' option is going on.

data.name: LoadingToDos
data.comment: Loading a list of "to-do"'s

data.name: LocationOptIn
data.comment: Used for a header on the page to opt-in to location

data.name: MapRoadView
data.comment: All lowercase app bar menu item for the 'road view' on maps

data.name: MapSatelliteView
data.comment: All lowercase app bar menu item for the 'satellite view' on maps

data.name: Me
data.comment: lowercase text for me (your self)

data.name: NoMayor
data.comment: Indicates there is 'no mayor' at the current place, lowercase

data.name: Notifications
data.comment: For a page, pivot, or item where there are notifications about some action happening

data.name: OptionalShoutOut
data.comment: A watermark for a text box showing that you can optionally provide a "shout" about a place.

data.name: QuickCheckIn
data.comment: Action text for the button to quickly check-in.

data.name: SeeAllNotifications
data.comment: Action text used to go to a page listing all notifications

data.name: ShareMail
data.comment: Capitalized text for Mail in the share task.

data.name: ShareMessaging
data.comment: Capitalized text for Messaging in the Share task

data.name: ShareSocialNetwork
data.comment: Capitalized text for sharing using a social network status update in the Share Task.

data.name: ShareTaskTitle
data.comment: All-caps text for the share task page.

data.name: Stylized4thAndMayor
data.comment: The stylized text used in pivots and throughout the app for a capitalized version of the app name.

data.name: Twitter
